snippet: The Oscar-winning actress, whose 2011 memoir "Then Again'' was warmly received by critics, will write a second book on "beauty, aging and being a woman.''
abstract: The Oscar-winning actress, whose 2011 memoir "Then Again'' was warmly received by critics, will write a second book on "beauty, aging and being a woman.''

headline.main: Diane Keaton to Write Book on Beauty and Aging
headline.print_headline: Keaton to Write On Beauty, Aging
